6103  text_line.erase (0,6); nElem = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6104  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
6105  getline(mesh_file, text_line);
6106  }
6107  }
6108 
6109  /*--- Read the inner points ---*/
6110 
6111  position = text_line.find ("NPOIN=",0);
6112  if (position != string::npos) {
6113  text_line.erase (0,6); nPoint = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6114  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
6115  getline(mesh_file, text_line);
6116  }
6117  }
6118 
6119  /*--- Read the boundaries ---*/
6120 
6121  position = text_line.find ("NMARK=",0);
6122  if (position != string::npos) {
6123  text_line.erase (0,6); nMarker = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6124  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
6125  getline(mesh_file, text_line);
6126  getline(mesh_file, text_line);
6127  text_line.erase (0,13); nVertex = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6128  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
6129  getline(mesh_file, text_line);
6130  }
6131  }
6132  }
6133 
6134  /*--- Read the FFDBox information ---*/
6135 
6136  position = text_line.find ("FFD_NBOX=",0);
6137  if (position != string::npos) {
6138  text_line.erase (0,9);
6139  nFFDBox = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6140 
6141  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << nFFDBox << " Free Form Deformation boxes." << endl;
6142 
6143  nCornerPoints = new unsigned short[nFFDBox];
6144  nControlPoints = new unsigned short[nFFDBox];
6145  nSurfacePoints = new unsigned long[nFFDBox];
6146 
6147  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6148  text_line.erase (0,11);
6149  nLevel = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6150 
6151  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << nLevel << " Free Form Deformation nested levels." << endl;
6152 
6153  for (iFFDBox = 0 ; iFFDBox < nFFDBox; iFFDBox++) {
6154 
6155  /*--- Read the name of the FFD box ---*/
6156 
6157  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6158  text_line.erase (0,8);
6159 
6160  /*--- Remove extra data from the FFDBox name ---*/
6161 
6162  string::size_type position;
6163  for (iChar = 0; iChar < 20; iChar++) {
6164  position = text_line.find( " ", 0 );
6165  if (position != string::npos) text_line.erase (position,1);
6166  position = text_line.find( "\r", 0 );
6167  if (position != string::npos) text_line.erase (position,1);
6168  position = text_line.find( "\n", 0 );
6169  if (position != string::npos) text_line.erase (position,1);
6170  }
6171 
6172  string TagFFDBox = text_line.c_str();
6173 
6174  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "FFD box tag: " << TagFFDBox <<". ";
6175 
6176  /*--- Read the level of the FFD box ---*/
6177 
6178  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6179  text_line.erase (0,10);
6180  LevelFFDBox = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6181 
6182  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "FFD box level: " << LevelFFDBox <<". ";
6183 
6184  /*--- Read the degree of the FFD box ---*/
6185 
6186  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6187  text_line.erase (0,13); degree[0] = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6188  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6189  text_line.erase (0,13); degree[1] = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6190 
6191  if (nDim == 2) {
6192  degree[2] = 1;
6193  }
6194  else {
6195  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6196  text_line.erase (0,13); degree[2] = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6197  }
6198 
6199  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6200  cout << "Degrees: " << degree[0] << ", " << degree[1];
6201  if (nDim == 3) cout << ", " << degree[2];
6202  cout << ". " << endl;
6203  }
6204 
6205  FFDBox[iFFDBox] = new CFreeFormDefBox(SU2_TYPE::Int(degree[0]), SU2_TYPE::Int(degree[1]), SU2_TYPE::Int(degree[2]));
6206  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetTag(TagFFDBox); FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetLevel(LevelFFDBox);
6207 
6208  /*--- Read the number of parents boxes ---*/
6209 
6210  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6211  text_line.erase (0,12);
6212  nParentFFDBox = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6213  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Number of parent boxes: " << nParentFFDBox <<". ";
6214  for (iParentFFDBox = 0; iParentFFDBox < nParentFFDBox; iParentFFDBox++) {
6215  getline(mesh_file, text_line);
6216 
6217  /*--- Remove extra data from the FFDBox name ---*/
6218 
6219  string::size_type position;
6220  for (iChar = 0; iChar < 20; iChar++) {
6221  position = text_line.find( " ", 0 );
6222  if (position != string::npos) text_line.erase (position,1);
6223  position = text_line.find( "\r", 0 );
6224  if (position != string::npos) text_line.erase (position,1);
6225  position = text_line.find( "\n", 0 );
6226  if (position != string::npos) text_line.erase (position,1);
6227  }
6228 
6229  string ParentFFDBox = text_line.c_str();
6230  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetParentFFDBox(ParentFFDBox);
6231  }
6232 
6233  /*--- Read the number of children boxes ---*/
6234 
6235  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6236  text_line.erase (0,13);
6237  nChildFFDBox = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6238  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Number of child boxes: " << nChildFFDBox <<"." << endl;
6239 
6240  for (iChildFFDBox = 0; iChildFFDBox < nChildFFDBox; iChildFFDBox++) {
6241  getline(mesh_file, text_line);
6242 
6243  /*--- Remove extra data from the FFDBox name ---*/
6244 
6245  string::size_type position;
6246  for (iChar = 0; iChar < 20; iChar++) {
6247  position = text_line.find( " ", 0 );
6248  if (position != string::npos) text_line.erase (position,1);
6249  position = text_line.find( "\r", 0 );
6250  if (position != string::npos) text_line.erase (position,1);
6251  position = text_line.find( "\n", 0 );
6252  if (position != string::npos) text_line.erase (position,1);
6253  }
6254 
6255  string ChildFFDBox = text_line.c_str();
6256  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetChildFFDBox(ChildFFDBox);
6257  }
6258 
6259  /*--- Read the number of the corner points ---*/
6260 
6261  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6262  text_line.erase (0,18); nCornerPoints[iFFDBox] = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6263  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Corner points: " << nCornerPoints[iFFDBox] <<". ";
6264  if (nDim == 2) nCornerPoints[iFFDBox] = nCornerPoints[iFFDBox]*SU2_TYPE::Int(2);
6265 
6266  /*--- Read the coordinates of the corner points ---*/
6267 
6268  for (iCornerPoints = 0; iCornerPoints < nCornerPoints[iFFDBox]; iCornerPoints++) {
6269 
6270  if (nDim == 2) {
6271  if (iCornerPoints < nCornerPoints[iFFDBox]/SU2_TYPE::Int(2)) {
6272  getline(mesh_file, text_line); istringstream FFDBox_line(text_line);
6273  FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[0]; FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[1]; CPcoord[2] = -0.5;
6274  }
6275  else {
6276  CPcoord[0] = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetCoordCornerPoints(0, iCornerPoints-nCornerPoints[iFFDBox]/SU2_TYPE::Int(2));
6277  CPcoord[1] = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetCoordCornerPoints(1, iCornerPoints-nCornerPoints[iFFDBox]/SU2_TYPE::Int(2));
6278  CPcoord[2] = 0.5;
6279  }
6280  }
6281  else {
6282  getline(mesh_file, text_line); istringstream FFDBox_line(text_line);
6283  FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[0]; FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[1]; FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[2];
6284  }
6285 
6286  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCoordCornerPoints(CPcoord, iCornerPoints);
6287 
6288  }
6289 
6290  /*--- Read the number of the control points ---*/
6291 
6292  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6293  text_line.erase (0,19); nControlPoints[iFFDBox] = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6294 
6295  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Control points: " << nControlPoints[iFFDBox] <<". ";
6296 
6297  /*--- Method to identify if there is a FFDBox definition ---*/
6298 
6299  if (nControlPoints[iFFDBox] != 0) FFDBoxDefinition = true;
6300 
6301  /*--- Read the coordinates of the control points ---*/
6302 
6303  for (iControlPoints = 0; iControlPoints < nControlPoints[iFFDBox]; iControlPoints++) {
6304  getline(mesh_file, text_line); istringstream FFDBox_line(text_line);
6305  FFDBox_line >> iDegree; FFDBox_line >> jDegree; FFDBox_line >> kDegree;
6306  FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[0]; FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[1]; FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[2];
6307  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCoordControlPoints(CPcoord, iDegree, jDegree, kDegree);
6308  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCoordControlPoints_Copy(CPcoord, iDegree, jDegree, kDegree);
6309  }
6310 
6311  getline (mesh_file, text_line);
6312  text_line.erase (0,19); nSurfacePoints[iFFDBox] = atoi(text_line.c_str());
6313 
6314  /*--- The surface points parametric coordinates, all the nodes read the FFD
6315  information but they only store their part ---*/
6316 
6317  my_nSurfPoints = 0;
6318  for (iSurfacePoints = 0; iSurfacePoints < nSurfacePoints[iFFDBox]; iSurfacePoints++) {
6319  getline(mesh_file, text_line); istringstream FFDBox_line(text_line);
6320  FFDBox_line >> iTag; FFDBox_line >> iPoint;
6321 
6322  if (config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iTag) != -1) {
6323 
6324  iMarker = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iTag);
6325  FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[0]; FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[1]; FFDBox_line >> CPcoord[2];
6326 
6327  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
6328  jPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
6329  if (iPoint == geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGlobalIndex()) {
6330  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
6331  coord[iDim] = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord()[iDim];
6332  }
6333  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Set_MarkerIndex(iMarker);
6334  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Set_VertexIndex(iVertex);
6335  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Set_PointIndex(jPoint);
6336  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Set_ParametricCoord(CPcoord);
6337  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Set_CartesianCoord(coord);
6338  my_nSurfPoints++;
6339  }
6340  }
6341 
6342  }
6343 
6344  }
6345 
6346  nSurfacePoints[iFFDBox] = my_nSurfPoints;
6347 
6348 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6349  nSurfPoints = 0;
6350  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&my_nSurfPoints, &nSurfPoints, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6351  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Surface points: " << nSurfPoints <<"."<< endl;
6352 #else
6353  nSurfPoints = my_nSurfPoints;
6354  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Surface points: " << nSurfPoints <<"."<< endl;
6355 #endif
6356 
6357  }
6358 
6359  delete [] nCornerPoints;
6360  delete [] nControlPoints;
6361  delete [] nSurfacePoints;
6362  }
6363  }
6364  mesh_file.close();
6365 
6366  if (nFFDBox == 0) {
6367  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout <<"There is no FFD box definition. Just in case, check the .su2 file" << endl;
6368  }
6369 
6370 }
6371 
6372 void CSurfaceMovement::ReadFFDInfo(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, CFreeFormDefBox **FFDBox) {
6373 
6374  string text_line, iTag;
6375  ifstream mesh_file;
6376  su2double coord[3];
6377  unsigned short degree[3], iFFDBox, iCornerPoints, LevelFFDBox, nParentFFDBox,
6378  iParentFFDBox, nChildFFDBox, iChildFFDBox, *nCornerPoints;
6379 
6380  unsigned short nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
6381  int rank = MASTER_NODE;
6382 
6383 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6384  MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
6385 #endif
6386 
6387 
6388  /*--- Read the FFDBox information from the config file ---*/
6389 
6390  nFFDBox = config->GetnFFDBox();
6391 
6392  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << nFFDBox << " Free Form Deformation boxes." << endl;
6393 
6394  nCornerPoints = new unsigned short[nFFDBox];
6395 
6396  nLevel = 1; // Nested FFD is not active
6397 
6398  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << nLevel << " Free Form Deformation nested levels." << endl;
6399 
6400  for (iFFDBox = 0 ; iFFDBox < nFFDBox; iFFDBox++) {
6401 
6402  /*--- Read the name of the FFD box ---*/
6403 
6404  string TagFFDBox = config->GetTagFFDBox(iFFDBox);
6405 
6406  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "FFD box tag: " << TagFFDBox <<". ";
6407 
6408  /*--- Read the level of the FFD box ---*/
6409 
6410  LevelFFDBox = 0; // Nested FFD is not active
6411 
6412  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "FFD box level: " << LevelFFDBox <<". ";
6413 
6414  /*--- Read the degree of the FFD box ---*/
6415 
6416  degree[0] = config->GetDegreeFFDBox(iFFDBox, 0);
6417  degree[1] = config->GetDegreeFFDBox(iFFDBox, 1);
6418 
6419  if (nDim == 2) { degree[2] = 1; }
6420  else { degree[2] = config->GetDegreeFFDBox(iFFDBox, 2); }
6421 
6422  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6423  cout << "Degrees: " << degree[0] << ", " << degree[1];
6424  if (nDim == 3) cout << ", " << degree[2];
6425  cout << ". " << endl;
6426  }
6427 
6428  FFDBox[iFFDBox] = new CFreeFormDefBox(SU2_TYPE::Int(degree[0]), SU2_TYPE::Int(degree[1]), SU2_TYPE::Int(degree[2]));
6429  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetTag(TagFFDBox); FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetLevel(LevelFFDBox);
6430 
6431  /*--- Read the number of parents boxes ---*/
6432 
6433  nParentFFDBox = 0; // Nested FFD is not active
6434  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Number of parent boxes: " << nParentFFDBox <<". ";
6435 
6436  for (iParentFFDBox = 0; iParentFFDBox < nParentFFDBox; iParentFFDBox++) {
6437  string ParentFFDBox = "NONE"; // Nested FFD is not active
6438  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetParentFFDBox(ParentFFDBox);
6439  }
6440 
6441  /*--- Read the number of children boxes ---*/
6442 
6443  nChildFFDBox = 0; // Nested FFD is not active
6444  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Number of child boxes: " << nChildFFDBox <<"." << endl;
6445 
6446  for (iChildFFDBox = 0; iChildFFDBox < nChildFFDBox; iChildFFDBox++) {
6447  string ChildFFDBox = "NONE"; // Nested FFD is not active
6448  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetChildFFDBox(ChildFFDBox);
6449  }
6450 
6451  /*--- Read the number of the corner points ---*/
6452 
6453  nCornerPoints[iFFDBox] = 8;
6454 
6455  /*--- Read the coordinates of the corner points ---*/
6456 
6457  for (iCornerPoints = 0; iCornerPoints < nCornerPoints[iFFDBox]; iCornerPoints++) {
6458 
6459  if (nDim == 2) {
6460  if (iCornerPoints < nCornerPoints[iFFDBox]/SU2_TYPE::Int(2)) {
6461  coord[0] = config->GetCoordFFDBox(iFFDBox, iCornerPoints*3);
6462  coord[1] = config->GetCoordFFDBox(iFFDBox, iCornerPoints*3+1);
6463  coord[2] = -0.5;
6464  }
6465  else {
6466  coord[0] = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetCoordCornerPoints(0, iCornerPoints-nCornerPoints[iFFDBox]/SU2_TYPE::Int(2));
6467  coord[1] = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetCoordCornerPoints(1, iCornerPoints-nCornerPoints[iFFDBox]/SU2_TYPE::Int(2));
6468  coord[2] = 0.5;
6469  }
6470  }
6471  else {
6472  coord[0] = config->GetCoordFFDBox(iFFDBox, iCornerPoints*3);
6473  coord[1] = config->GetCoordFFDBox(iFFDBox, iCornerPoints*3+1);
6474  coord[2] = config->GetCoordFFDBox(iFFDBox, iCornerPoints*3+2);
6475  }
6476 
6477  FFDBox[iFFDBox]->SetCoordCornerPoints(coord, iCornerPoints);
6478 
6479  }
6480 
6481  /*--- Method to identify if there is a FFDBox definition ---*/
6482 
6483  FFDBoxDefinition = false;
6484 
6485  }
6486 
6487  delete [] nCornerPoints;
6488 
6489  if (nFFDBox == 0) {
6490  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout <<"There is no FFD box definition. Check the config file." << endl;
6491 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
6492  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6493 #else
6494  MPI_Abort(MPI_COMM_WORLD,1);
6495  MPI_Finalize();
6496 #endif
6497  }
6498 
6499 }
6500 
6501 void CSurfaceMovement::MergeFFDInfo(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
6502 
6503  /*--- Local variables needed on all processors ---*/
6504 
6505  unsigned long iPoint;
6506  unsigned short iFFDBox;
6507 
6508 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
6509 
6510  /*--- In serial, the single process has access to all geometry, so simply
6511  load the coordinates into the data structure. ---*/
6512 
6513  /*--- Total number of points in each FFD box. ---*/
6514 
6515  for (iFFDBox = 0 ; iFFDBox < nFFDBox; iFFDBox++) {
6516 
6517  /*--- Loop over the mesh to collect the coords of the local points. ---*/
6518 
6519  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnSurfacePoint(); iPoint++) {
6520 
6521  /*--- Retrieve the current parametric coordinates at this node. ---*/
6522 
6523  GlobalCoordX[iFFDBox].push_back(FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_ParametricCoord(iPoint)[0]);
6524  GlobalCoordY[iFFDBox].push_back(FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_ParametricCoord(iPoint)[1]);
6525  GlobalCoordZ[iFFDBox].push_back(FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_ParametricCoord(iPoint)[2]);
6526  GlobalPoint[iFFDBox].push_back(FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_PointIndex(iPoint));
6527 
6528  /*--- Marker of the boundary in the local domain. ---*/
6529 
6530  unsigned short MarkerIndex = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_MarkerIndex(iPoint);
6531  string TagBound = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(MarkerIndex);
6532 
6533  /*--- Find the Marker of the boundary in the config file. ---*/
6534 
6535  unsigned short MarkerIndex_CfgFile = config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(TagBound);
6536  string TagBound_CfgFile = config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(MarkerIndex_CfgFile);
6537 
6538  /*--- Set the value of the tag at this node. ---*/
6539 
6540  GlobalTag[iFFDBox].push_back(TagBound_CfgFile);
6541 
6542  }
6543 
6544  }
6545 
6546 #else
6547 
6548  /*--- MPI preprocessing ---*/
6549 
6550  int iProcessor, nProcessor, rank;
6551  MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
6552  MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &nProcessor);
6553 
6554  /*--- Local variables needed for merging the geometry with MPI. ---*/
6555 
6556  unsigned long jPoint, iPointLocal;
6557  unsigned long Buffer_Send_nPoint[1], *Buffer_Recv_nPoint = NULL;
6558  unsigned long nLocalPoint = 0, MaxLocalPoint = 0;
6559  unsigned long nBuffer_Scalar = 0;
6560 
6561  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) Buffer_Recv_nPoint = new unsigned long[nProcessor];
6562 
6563  for (iFFDBox = 0 ; iFFDBox < nFFDBox; iFFDBox++) {
6564 
6565  nLocalPoint = 0;
6566  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnSurfacePoint(); iPoint++) {
6567 
6568  iPointLocal = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_PointIndex(iPoint);
6569 
6570  if (iPointLocal < geometry->GetnPointDomain()) {
6571  nLocalPoint++;
6572  }
6573 
6574  }
6575  Buffer_Send_nPoint[0] = nLocalPoint;
6576 
6577  /*--- Communicate the total number of nodes on this domain. ---*/
6578 
6579  SU2_MPI::Gather(&Buffer_Send_nPoint, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
6580  Buffer_Recv_nPoint, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6581  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nLocalPoint, &MaxLocalPoint, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6582 
6583  nBuffer_Scalar = MaxLocalPoint;
6584 
6585  /*--- Send and Recv buffers. ---*/
6586 
6587  su2double *Buffer_Send_X = new su2double[MaxLocalPoint];
6588  su2double *Buffer_Recv_X = NULL;
6589 
6590  su2double *Buffer_Send_Y = new su2double[MaxLocalPoint];
6591  su2double *Buffer_Recv_Y = NULL;
6592 
6593  su2double *Buffer_Send_Z = new su2double[MaxLocalPoint];
6594  su2double *Buffer_Recv_Z = NULL;
6595 
6596  unsigned long *Buffer_Send_Point = new unsigned long[MaxLocalPoint];
6597  unsigned long *Buffer_Recv_Point = NULL;
6598 
6599  unsigned short *Buffer_Send_MarkerIndex_CfgFile = new unsigned short[MaxLocalPoint];
6600  unsigned short *Buffer_Recv_MarkerIndex_CfgFile = NULL;
6601 
6602  /*--- Prepare the receive buffers in the master node only. ---*/
6603 
6604  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6605 
6606  Buffer_Recv_X = new su2double[nProcessor*MaxLocalPoint];
6607  Buffer_Recv_Y = new su2double[nProcessor*MaxLocalPoint];
6608  Buffer_Recv_Z = new su2double[nProcessor*MaxLocalPoint];
6609  Buffer_Recv_Point = new unsigned long[nProcessor*MaxLocalPoint];
6610  Buffer_Recv_MarkerIndex_CfgFile = new unsigned short[nProcessor*MaxLocalPoint];
6611 
6612  }
6613 
6614  /*--- Main communication routine. Loop over each coordinate and perform
6615  the MPI comm. Temporary 1-D buffers are used to send the coordinates at
6616  all nodes on each partition to the master node. These are then unpacked
6617  by the master and sorted by global index in one large n-dim. array. ---*/
6618 
6619  /*--- Loop over this partition to collect the coords of the local points. ---*/
6620 
6621  jPoint = 0;
6622  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnSurfacePoint(); iPoint++) {
6623 
6624  iPointLocal = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_PointIndex(iPoint);
6625 
6626  if (iPointLocal < geometry->GetnPointDomain()) {
6627 
6628  /*--- Load local coords into the temporary send buffer. ---*/
6629 
6630  Buffer_Send_X[jPoint] = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_ParametricCoord(iPoint)[0];
6631  Buffer_Send_Y[jPoint] = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_ParametricCoord(iPoint)[1];
6632  Buffer_Send_Z[jPoint] = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_ParametricCoord(iPoint)[2];
6633 
6634  /*--- Store the global index for this local node. ---*/
6635 
6636  Buffer_Send_Point[jPoint] = geometry->node[FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_PointIndex(iPoint)]->GetGlobalIndex();
6637 
6638  /*--- Marker of the boundary in the local domain. ---*/
6639 
6640  unsigned short MarkerIndex = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->Get_MarkerIndex(iPoint);
6641  string TagBound = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(MarkerIndex);
6642 
6643  /*--- Find the Marker of the boundary in the config file.---*/
6644 
6645  unsigned short MarkerIndex_CfgFile = config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(TagBound);
6646  Buffer_Send_MarkerIndex_CfgFile[jPoint] = MarkerIndex_CfgFile;
6647 
6648  jPoint++;
6649 
6650  }
6651 
6652  }
6653 
6654  /*--- Gather the coordinate data on the master node using MPI. ---*/
6655 
6656  SU2_MPI::Gather(Buffer_Send_X, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_DOUBLE, Buffer_Recv_X, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6657  SU2_MPI::Gather(Buffer_Send_Y, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_DOUBLE, Buffer_Recv_Y, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6658  SU2_MPI::Gather(Buffer_Send_Z, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_DOUBLE, Buffer_Recv_Z, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6659  SU2_MPI::Gather(Buffer_Send_Point, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, Buffer_Recv_Point, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6660  SU2_MPI::Gather(Buffer_Send_MarkerIndex_CfgFile, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, Buffer_Recv_MarkerIndex_CfgFile, nBuffer_Scalar, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6661 
6662  /*--- The master node unpacks and sorts this variable by global index ---*/
6663 
6664  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6665 
6666  jPoint = 0;
6667 
6668  for (iProcessor = 0; iProcessor < nProcessor; iProcessor++) {
6669  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < Buffer_Recv_nPoint[iProcessor]; iPoint++) {
6670 
6671  /*--- Get global index, then loop over each variable and store ---*/
6672 
6673  GlobalCoordX[iFFDBox].push_back(Buffer_Recv_X[jPoint]);
6674  GlobalCoordY[iFFDBox].push_back(Buffer_Recv_Y[jPoint]);
6675  GlobalCoordZ[iFFDBox].push_back(Buffer_Recv_Z[jPoint]);
6676  GlobalPoint[iFFDBox].push_back(Buffer_Recv_Point[jPoint]);
6677 
6678  string TagBound_CfgFile = config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(Buffer_Recv_MarkerIndex_CfgFile[jPoint]);
6679  GlobalTag[iFFDBox].push_back(TagBound_CfgFile);
6680  jPoint++;
6681 
6682  }
6683 
6684  /*--- Adjust jPoint to index of next proc's data in the buffers. ---*/
6685 
6686  jPoint = (iProcessor+1)*nBuffer_Scalar;
6687 
6688  }
6689  }
6690 
6691  /*--- Immediately release the temporary data buffers. ---*/
6692 
6693  delete [] Buffer_Send_X;
6694  delete [] Buffer_Send_Y;
6695  delete [] Buffer_Send_Z;
6696  delete [] Buffer_Send_Point;
6697  delete [] Buffer_Send_MarkerIndex_CfgFile;
6698 
6699  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6700  delete [] Buffer_Recv_X;
6701  delete [] Buffer_Recv_Y;
6702  delete [] Buffer_Recv_Z;
6703  delete [] Buffer_Recv_Point;
6704  delete [] Buffer_Recv_MarkerIndex_CfgFile;
6705  }
6706 
6707  }
6708 
6709  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6710  delete [] Buffer_Recv_nPoint;
6711  }
6712 
6713 #endif
6714 
6715 }
6716 
6717 void CSurfaceMovement::WriteFFDInfo(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
6718 
6719 
6720  unsigned short iOrder, jOrder, kOrder, iFFDBox, iCornerPoints, iParentFFDBox, iChildFFDBox;
6721  unsigned long iSurfacePoints;
6722  char cstr[MAX_STRING_SIZE], mesh_file[MAX_STRING_SIZE];
6723  string str;
6724  ofstream output_file;
6725  su2double *coord;
6726  string text_line;
6727 
6728  int rank = MASTER_NODE;
6729 
6730 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6731  MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
6732 #endif
6733 
6734  unsigned short nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
6735 
6736  /*--- Merge the FFD info ---*/
6737 
6738  MergeFFDInfo(geometry, config);
6739 
6740  /*--- Attach to the mesh file the FFD information ---*/
6741 
6742  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6743 
6744  /*--- Read the name of the output file ---*/
6745 
6746  str = config->GetMesh_Out_FileName();
6747  strcpy (mesh_file, str.c_str());
6748  strcpy (cstr, mesh_file);
6749 
6750  output_file.precision(15);
6751  output_file.open(cstr, ios::out | ios::app);
6752 
6753  if (nFFDBox != 0) {
6754  output_file << "FFD_NBOX= " << nFFDBox << endl;
6755  output_file << "FFD_NLEVEL= " << nLevel << endl;
6756  }
6757 
6758  for (iFFDBox = 0 ; iFFDBox < nFFDBox; iFFDBox++) {
6759 
6760  output_file << "FFD_TAG= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetTag() << endl;
6761  output_file << "FFD_LEVEL= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetLevel() << endl;
6762 
6763  output_file << "FFD_DEGREE_I= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetlOrder()-1 << endl;
6764  output_file << "FFD_DEGREE_J= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetmOrder()-1 << endl;
6765  if (nDim == 3) output_file << "FFD_DEGREE_K= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnOrder()-1 << endl;
6766 
6767  output_file << "FFD_PARENTS= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnParentFFDBox() << endl;
6768  for (iParentFFDBox = 0; iParentFFDBox < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnParentFFDBox(); iParentFFDBox++)
6769  output_file << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetParentFFDBoxTag(iParentFFDBox) << endl;
6770  output_file << "FFD_CHILDREN= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnChildFFDBox() << endl;
6771  for (iChildFFDBox = 0; iChildFFDBox < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnChildFFDBox(); iChildFFDBox++)
6772  output_file << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetChildFFDBoxTag(iChildFFDBox) << endl;
6773 
6774  if (nDim == 2) {
6775  output_file << "FFD_CORNER_POINTS= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnCornerPoints()/SU2_TYPE::Int(2) << endl;
6776  for (iCornerPoints = 0; iCornerPoints < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnCornerPoints()/SU2_TYPE::Int(2); iCornerPoints++) {
6777  coord = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetCoordCornerPoints(iCornerPoints);
6778  output_file << coord[0] << "\t" << coord[1] << endl;
6779  }
6780  }
6781  else {
6782  output_file << "FFD_CORNER_POINTS= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnCornerPoints() << endl;
6783  for (iCornerPoints = 0; iCornerPoints < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnCornerPoints(); iCornerPoints++) {
6784  coord = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetCoordCornerPoints(iCornerPoints);
6785  output_file << coord[0] << "\t" << coord[1] << "\t" << coord[2] << endl;
6786  }
6787  }
6788 
6789  /*--- Writing control points ---*/
6790 
6791  if (FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnControlPoints() == 0) {
6792  output_file << "FFD_CONTROL_POINTS= 0" << endl;
6793  }
6794  else {
6795  output_file << "FFD_CONTROL_POINTS= " << FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnControlPoints() << endl;
6796  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetlOrder(); iOrder++)
6797  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetmOrder(); jOrder++)
6798  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnOrder(); kOrder++) {
6799  coord = FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetCoordControlPoints(iOrder, jOrder, kOrder);
6800  output_file << iOrder << "\t" << jOrder << "\t" << kOrder << "\t" << coord[0] << "\t" << coord[1] << "\t" << coord[2] << endl;
6801  }
6802  }
6803 
6804  /*--- Writing surface points ---*/
6805 
6806  if (FFDBox[iFFDBox]->GetnControlPoints() == 0) {
6807  output_file << "FFD_SURFACE_POINTS= 0" << endl;
6808  }
6809  else {
6810  output_file << "FFD_SURFACE_POINTS= " << GlobalTag[iFFDBox].size() << endl;
6811 
6812  for (iSurfacePoints = 0; iSurfacePoints < GlobalTag[iFFDBox].size(); iSurfacePoints++) {
6813  output_file << scientific << GlobalTag[iFFDBox][iSurfacePoints] << "\t" << GlobalPoint[iFFDBox][iSurfacePoints]
6814  << "\t" << GlobalCoordX[iFFDBox][iSurfacePoints] << "\t" << GlobalCoordY[iFFDBox][iSurfacePoints]
6815  << "\t" << GlobalCoordZ[iFFDBox][iSurfacePoints] << endl;
6816  }
6817 
6818  }
6819 
6820  }
6821 
6822  output_file.close();
6823 
6824  }
6825 
6826 }
6827 
6828 CFreeFormDefBox::CFreeFormDefBox(void) : CGridMovement() { }
6829 
6830 CFreeFormDefBox::CFreeFormDefBox(unsigned short val_lDegree, unsigned short val_mDegree, unsigned short val_nDegree) : CGridMovement() {
6831 
6832  unsigned short iCornerPoints, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder, iDim;
6833 
6834  /*--- FFD is always 3D (even in 2D problems) ---*/
6835 
6836  nDim = 3;
6837  nCornerPoints = 8;
6838 
6839  /*--- Allocate Corners points ---*/
6840 
6841  Coord_Corner_Points = new su2double* [nCornerPoints];
6842  for (iCornerPoints = 0; iCornerPoints < nCornerPoints; iCornerPoints++)
6843  Coord_Corner_Points[iCornerPoints] = new su2double [nDim];
6844 
6845  ParamCoord = new su2double[nDim]; ParamCoord_ = new su2double[nDim];
6846  cart_coord = new su2double[nDim]; cart_coord_ = new su2double[nDim];
6847  Gradient = new su2double[nDim];
6848 
6849  lDegree = val_lDegree; lOrder = lDegree+1;
6850  mDegree = val_mDegree; mOrder = mDegree+1;
6851  nDegree = val_nDegree; nOrder = nDegree+1;
6852  nControlPoints = lOrder*mOrder*nOrder;
6853 
6854  lDegree_Copy = val_lDegree; lOrder_Copy = lDegree+1;
6855  mDegree_Copy = val_mDegree; mOrder_Copy = mDegree+1;
6856  nDegree_Copy = val_nDegree; nOrder_Copy = nDegree+1;
6857  nControlPoints_Copy = lOrder_Copy*mOrder_Copy*nOrder_Copy;
6858 
6859  Coord_Control_Points = new su2double*** [lOrder];
6860  ParCoord_Control_Points = new su2double*** [lOrder];
6861  Coord_Control_Points_Copy = new su2double*** [lOrder];
6862  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < lOrder; iOrder++) {
6863  Coord_Control_Points[iOrder] = new su2double** [mOrder];
6864  ParCoord_Control_Points[iOrder] = new su2double** [mOrder];
6865  Coord_Control_Points_Copy[iOrder] = new su2double** [mOrder];
6866  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < mOrder; jOrder++) {
6867  Coord_Control_Points[iOrder][jOrder] = new su2double* [nOrder];
6868  ParCoord_Control_Points[iOrder][jOrder] = new su2double* [nOrder];
6869  Coord_Control_Points_Copy[iOrder][jOrder] = new su2double* [nOrder];
6870  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < nOrder; kOrder++) {
6871  Coord_Control_Points[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder] = new su2double [nDim];
6872  ParCoord_Control_Points[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder] = new su2double [nDim];
6873  Coord_Control_Points_Copy[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder] = new su2double [nDim];
6874  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6875  Coord_Control_Points[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder][iDim] = 0.0;
6876  ParCoord_Control_Points[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder][iDim] = 0.0;
6877  Coord_Control_Points_Copy[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder][iDim] = 0.0;
6878  }
6879  }
6880  }
6881  }
6882 
6883 }
6884 
6885 CFreeFormDefBox::~CFreeFormDefBox(void) {
6886  unsigned short iOrder, jOrder, kOrder, iCornerPoints;
6887 
6888  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < lOrder; iOrder++)
6889  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < mOrder; jOrder++)
6890  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < nOrder; kOrder++) {
6891  delete [] Coord_Control_Points[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder];
6892  delete [] ParCoord_Control_Points[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder];
6893  delete [] Coord_Control_Points_Copy[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder];
6894  }
6895  delete [] Coord_Control_Points;
6896  delete [] ParCoord_Control_Points;
6897  delete [] Coord_Control_Points_Copy;
6898 
6899  delete [] ParamCoord;
6900  delete [] cart_coord;
6901  delete [] Gradient;
6902 
6903  for (iCornerPoints = 0; iCornerPoints < nCornerPoints; iCornerPoints++)
6904  delete [] Coord_Corner_Points[iCornerPoints];
6905  delete [] Coord_Corner_Points;
6906 }
6907 
6908 void CFreeFormDefBox::SetUnitCornerPoints(void) {
6909 
6910  unsigned short iDim;
6911  su2double *coord = new su2double [nDim];
6912 
6913  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) coord[iDim] = 0.0;
6914 
6915  coord [0] = 0.0; coord [1] = 0.0; coord [2] = 0.0; this->SetCoordCornerPoints(coord, 0);
6916  coord [0] = 1.0; coord [1] = 0.0; coord [2] = 0.0; this->SetCoordCornerPoints(coord, 1);
6917  coord [0] = 1.0; coord [1] = 1.0; coord [2] = 0.0; this->SetCoordCornerPoints(coord, 2);
6918  coord [0] = 0.0; coord [1] = 1.0; coord [2] = 0.0; this->SetCoordCornerPoints(coord, 3);
6919  coord [0] = 0.0; coord [1] = 0.0; coord [2] = 1.0; this->SetCoordCornerPoints(coord, 4);
6920  coord [0] = 1.0; coord [1] = 0.0; coord [2] = 1.0; this->SetCoordCornerPoints(coord, 5);
6921  coord [0] = 1.0; coord [1] = 1.0; coord [2] = 1.0; this->SetCoordCornerPoints(coord, 6);
6922  coord [0] = 0.0; coord [1] = 1.0; coord [2] = 1.0; this->SetCoordCornerPoints(coord, 7);
6923 
6924  delete [] coord;
6925 
6926 }
6927 
6928 void CFreeFormDefBox::SetControlPoints_Parallelepiped (void) {
6929  unsigned short iDim, iDegree, jDegree, kDegree;
6930 
6931  /*--- Set base control points according to the notation of Vtk for hexahedrons ---*/
6932  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6933  Coord_Control_Points [0] [0] [0] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[0][iDim];
6934  Coord_Control_Points [lOrder-1] [0] [0] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[1][iDim];
6935  Coord_Control_Points [lOrder-1] [mOrder-1] [0] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[2][iDim];
6936  Coord_Control_Points [0] [mOrder-1] [0] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[3][iDim];
6937  Coord_Control_Points [0] [0] [nOrder-1] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[4][iDim];
6938  Coord_Control_Points [lOrder-1] [0] [nOrder-1] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[5][iDim];
6939  Coord_Control_Points [lOrder-1] [mOrder-1] [nOrder-1] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[6][iDim];
6940  Coord_Control_Points [0] [mOrder-1] [nOrder-1] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[7][iDim];
6941  }
6942 
6943  /*--- Fill the rest of the cubic matrix of control points with uniform spacing (parallelepiped) ---*/
6944  for (iDegree = 0; iDegree <= lDegree; iDegree++)
6945  for (jDegree = 0; jDegree <= mDegree; jDegree++)
6946  for (kDegree = 0; kDegree <= nDegree; kDegree++) {
6947  Coord_Control_Points[iDegree][jDegree][kDegree][0] = Coord_Corner_Points[0][0]
6948  + su2double(iDegree)/su2double(lDegree)*(Coord_Corner_Points[1][0]-Coord_Corner_Points[0][0]);
6949  Coord_Control_Points[iDegree][jDegree][kDegree][1] = Coord_Corner_Points[0][1]
6950  + su2double(jDegree)/su2double(mDegree)*(Coord_Corner_Points[3][1]-Coord_Corner_Points[0][1]);
6951  Coord_Control_Points[iDegree][jDegree][kDegree][2] = Coord_Corner_Points[0][2]
6952  + su2double(kDegree)/su2double(nDegree)*(Coord_Corner_Points[4][2]-Coord_Corner_Points[0][2]);
6953  }
6954 }
6955 
6956 void CFreeFormDefBox::SetSupportCP(CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBox) {
6957  unsigned short iDim, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder;
6958  unsigned short lOrder = FFDBox->GetlOrder();
6959  unsigned short mOrder = FFDBox->GetmOrder();
6960  unsigned short nOrder = FFDBox->GetnOrder();
6961 
6962  Coord_SupportCP = new su2double*** [lOrder];
6963  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < lOrder; iOrder++) {
6964  Coord_SupportCP[iOrder] = new su2double** [mOrder];
6965  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < mOrder; jOrder++) {
6966  Coord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder] = new su2double* [nOrder];
6967  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < nOrder; kOrder++)
6968  Coord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder] = new su2double [nDim];
6969  }
6970  }
6971 
6972  /*--- Set base support control points according to the notation of Vtk for hexahedrons ---*/
6973  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6974  Coord_SupportCP [0] [0] [0] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[0][iDim];
6975  Coord_SupportCP [lOrder-1] [0] [0] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[1][iDim];
6976  Coord_SupportCP [lOrder-1] [mOrder-1] [0] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[2][iDim];
6977  Coord_SupportCP [0] [mOrder-1] [0] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[3][iDim];
6978  Coord_SupportCP [0] [0] [nOrder-1] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[4][iDim];
6979  Coord_SupportCP [lOrder-1] [0] [nOrder-1] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[5][iDim];
6980  Coord_SupportCP [lOrder-1] [mOrder-1] [nOrder-1] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[6][iDim];
6981  Coord_SupportCP [0] [mOrder-1] [nOrder-1] [iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[7][iDim];
6982  }
6983 
6984  /*--- Fill the rest of the cubic matrix of support control points with uniform spacing ---*/
6985  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < lOrder; iOrder++)
6986  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < mOrder; jOrder++)
6987  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < nOrder; kOrder++) {
6988  Coord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder][0] = Coord_Corner_Points[0][0]
6989  + su2double(iOrder)/su2double(lOrder-1)*(Coord_Corner_Points[1][0]-Coord_Corner_Points[0][0]);
6990  Coord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder][1] = Coord_Corner_Points[0][1]
6991  + su2double(jOrder)/su2double(mOrder-1)*(Coord_Corner_Points[3][1]-Coord_Corner_Points[0][1]);
6992  Coord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder][2] = Coord_Corner_Points[0][2]
6993  + su2double(kOrder)/su2double(nOrder-1)*(Coord_Corner_Points[4][2]-Coord_Corner_Points[0][2]);
6994  }
6995 }
6996 
6997 void CFreeFormDefBox::SetSupportCPChange(CFreeFormDefBox *FFDBox) {
6998  unsigned short iDim, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder;
6999  su2double *CartCoordNew, *ParamCoord;
7000  unsigned short lOrder = FFDBox->GetlOrder();
7001  unsigned short mOrder = FFDBox->GetmOrder();
7002  unsigned short nOrder = FFDBox->GetnOrder();
7003 
7004  su2double ****ParamCoord_SupportCP = new su2double*** [lOrder];
7005  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < lOrder; iOrder++) {
7006  ParamCoord_SupportCP[iOrder] = new su2double** [mOrder];
7007  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < mOrder; jOrder++) {
7008  ParamCoord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder] = new su2double* [nOrder];
7009  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < nOrder; kOrder++)
7010  ParamCoord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder] = new su2double [nDim];
7011  }
7012  }
7013 
7014  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < lOrder; iOrder++)
7015  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < mOrder; jOrder++)
7016  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < nOrder; kOrder++)
7017  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7018  ParamCoord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder][iDim] =
7019  Coord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder][iDim];
7020 
7021  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7022  Coord_Control_Points[0][0][0][iDim] = FFDBox->GetCoordCornerPoints(iDim, 0);
7023  Coord_Control_Points[1][0][0][iDim] = FFDBox->GetCoordCornerPoints(iDim, 1);
7024  Coord_Control_Points[1][1][0][iDim] = FFDBox->GetCoordCornerPoints(iDim, 2);
7025  Coord_Control_Points[0][1][0][iDim] = FFDBox->GetCoordCornerPoints(iDim, 3);
7026  Coord_Control_Points[0][0][1][iDim] = FFDBox->GetCoordCornerPoints(iDim, 4);
7027  Coord_Control_Points[1][0][1][iDim] = FFDBox->GetCoordCornerPoints(iDim, 5);
7028  Coord_Control_Points[1][1][1][iDim] = FFDBox->GetCoordCornerPoints(iDim, 6);
7029  Coord_Control_Points[0][1][1][iDim] = FFDBox->GetCoordCornerPoints(iDim, 7);
7030  }
7031 
7032  for (iOrder = 0; iOrder < FFDBox->GetlOrder(); iOrder++) {
7033  for (jOrder = 0; jOrder < FFDBox->GetmOrder(); jOrder++) {
7034  for (kOrder = 0; kOrder < FFDBox->GetnOrder(); kOrder++) {
7035  ParamCoord = ParamCoord_SupportCP[iOrder][jOrder][kOrder];
7036  CartCoordNew = EvalCartesianCoord(ParamCoord);
7037  FFDBox->SetCoordControlPoints(CartCoordNew, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder);
7038  FFDBox->SetCoordControlPoints_Copy(CartCoordNew, iOrder, jOrder, kOrder);
7039  }
7040  }
7041  }
7042 
7043 }
7044 
7045 void CFreeFormDefBox::SetTecplot(CGeometry *geometry, unsigned short iFFDBox, bool original) {
7046 
7047  ofstream FFDBox_file;
7048  char FFDBox_filename[MAX_STRING_SIZE];
7049  bool new_file;
7050  unsigned short iDim, iDegree, jDegree, kDegree;
7051 
7052  nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
7053 
7054  SPRINTF (FFDBox_filename, "ffd_boxes.dat");
7055 
7056  if ((original) && (iFFDBox == 0)) new_file = true;
7057  else new_file = false;
7058 
7059  if (new_file) {
7060  FFDBox_file.open(FFDBox_filename, ios::out);
7061  FFDBox_file << "TITLE = \"Visualization of the FFD boxes generated by SU2_DEF.\"" << endl;
7062  if (nDim == 2) FFDBox_file << "VARIABLES = \"x\", \"y\"" << endl;
7063  else FFDBox_file << "VARIABLES = \"x\", \"y\", \"z\"" << endl;
7064  }
7065  else FFDBox_file.open(FFDBox_filename, ios::out | ios::app);
7066 
7067  FFDBox_file << "ZONE T= \"" << Tag;
7068  if (original) FFDBox_file << " (Original FFD)\"";
7069  else FFDBox_file << " (Deformed FFD)\"";
7070  if (nDim == 2) FFDBox_file << ", I="<<lDegree+1<<", J="<<mDegree+1<<", DATAPACKING=POINT" << endl;
7071  else FFDBox_file << ", I="<<lDegree+1<<", J="<<mDegree+1<<", K="<<nDegree+1<<", DATAPACKING=POINT" << endl;
7072 
7073  FFDBox_file.precision(15);
7074 
7075  if (nDim == 2) {
7076  for (jDegree = 0; jDegree <= mDegree; jDegree++) {
7077  for (iDegree = 0; iDegree <= lDegree; iDegree++) {
7078  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7079  FFDBox_file << scientific << Coord_Control_Points[iDegree][jDegree][0][iDim] << "\t";
7080  FFDBox_file << "\n";
7081  }
7082  }
7083  }
7084  else {
7085  for (kDegree = 0; kDegree <= nDegree; kDegree++) {
7086  for (jDegree = 0; jDegree <= mDegree; jDegree++) {
7087  for (iDegree = 0; iDegree <= lDegree; iDegree++) {
7088  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7089  FFDBox_file << scientific << Coord_Control_Points[iDegree][jDegree][kDegree][iDim] << "\t";
7090  FFDBox_file << "\n";
7091  }
7092  }
7093  }
7094  }
7095 
7096  FFDBox_file.close();
7097 }
7098 
7099 
7100 su2double *CFreeFormDefBox::GetParametricCoord_Analytical(su2double *cart_coord) {
7101  unsigned short iDim;
7102  su2double *e1, *e2, *e3, *e12, *e23, *e13, *p;
7103 
7104  /*--- Auxiliary Basis Vectors of the deformed FFDBox ---*/
7105  e1 = new su2double[3]; e2 = new su2double[3]; e3 = new su2double[3];
7106  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7107  e1[iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[1][iDim]-Coord_Corner_Points[0][iDim];
7108  e2[iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[3][iDim]-Coord_Corner_Points[0][iDim];
7109  e3[iDim] = Coord_Corner_Points[4][iDim]-Coord_Corner_Points[0][iDim];
7110  }
7111 
7112  /*--- Respective Cross-Products ---*/
7113  e12 = new su2double[3]; e23 = new su2double[3]; e13 = new su2double[3];
7114  CrossProduct(e1, e2, e12);
7115  CrossProduct(e1, e3, e13);
7116  CrossProduct(e2, e3, e23);
7117 
7118  /*--- p is Tranlated vector from the origin ---*/
7119  p = new su2double[3];
7120  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7121  p[iDim] = cart_coord[iDim] - Coord_Corner_Points[0][iDim];
7122 
7123  ParamCoord[0] = DotProduct(e23, p)/DotProduct(e23, e1);
7124  ParamCoord[1] = DotProduct(e13, p)/DotProduct(e13, e2);
7125  ParamCoord[2] = DotProduct(e12, p)/DotProduct(e12, e3);
7126 
7127  delete [] e1;
7128  delete [] e2;
7129  delete [] e3;
7130  delete [] e12;
7131  delete [] e23;
7132  delete [] e13;
7133  delete [] p;
7134 
7135  return ParamCoord;
7136 }
7137 
7138 su2double *CFreeFormDefBox::EvalCartesianCoord(su2double *ParamCoord) {
7139  unsigned short iDim, iDegree, jDegree, kDegree;
7140 
7141  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7142  cart_coord[iDim] = 0.0;
7143 
7144  for (iDegree = 0; iDegree <= lDegree; iDegree++)
7145  for (jDegree = 0; jDegree <= mDegree; jDegree++)
7146  for (kDegree = 0; kDegree <= nDegree; kDegree++)
7147  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7148  cart_coord[iDim] += Coord_Control_Points[iDegree][jDegree][kDegree][iDim]
7149  * GetBernstein(lDegree, iDegree, ParamCoord[0])
7150  * GetBernstein(mDegree, jDegree, ParamCoord[1])
7151  * GetBernstein(nDegree, kDegree, ParamCoord[2]);
7152  }
7153 
7154  return cart_coord;
7155 }
7156 
7157 su2double CFreeFormDefBox::GetBernstein(short val_n, short val_i, su2double val_t) {
7158 
7159  su2double value = 0.0;
7160 
7161  if (val_i > val_n) { value = 0.0; return value; }
7162 
7163  if (val_i == 0) {
7164  if (val_t == 0) value = 1.0;
7165  else if (val_t == 1) value = 0.0;
7166  else value = Binomial(val_n, val_i) * pow(val_t, val_i) * pow(1.0 - val_t, val_n - val_i);
7167  }
7168  else if (val_i == val_n) {
7169  if (val_t == 0) value = 0.0;
7170  else if (val_t == 1) value = 1.0;
7171  else value = pow(val_t, val_n);
7172  }
7173  else {
7174  if ((val_t == 0) || (val_t == 1)) value = 0.0;
7175  value = Binomial(val_n, val_i) * pow(val_t, val_i) * pow(1.0-val_t, val_n - val_i);
7176  }
7177 
7178  return value;
7179 
7180 }
7181 
7182 su2double CFreeFormDefBox::GetBernsteinDerivative(short val_n, short val_i,
7183  su2double val_t, short val_order) {
7184  su2double value = 0.0;
7185 
7186  /*--- Verify this subroutine, it provides negative val_n,
7187  which is a wrong value for GetBernstein ---*/
7188 
7189  if (val_order == 0) {
7190  value = GetBernstein(val_n, val_i, val_t); return value;
7191  }
7192 
7193  if (val_i == 0) {
7194  value = val_n*(-GetBernsteinDerivative(val_n-1, val_i, val_t, val_order-1)); return value;
7195  }
7196  else {
7197  if (val_n == 0) {
7198  value = val_t; return value;
7199  }
7200  else {
7201  value = val_n*(GetBernsteinDerivative(val_n-1, val_i-1, val_t, val_order-1) - GetBernsteinDerivative(val_n-1, val_i, val_t, val_order-1));
7202  return value;
7203  }
7204  }
7205 
7206  return value;
7207 }
7208 
7209 su2double *CFreeFormDefBox::GetFFDGradient(su2double *val_coord, su2double *xyz) {
7210 
7211  unsigned short iDim, jDim, lmn[3];
7212 
7213  /*--- Set the Degree of the Berstein polynomials ---*/
7214 
7215  lmn[0] = lDegree; lmn[1] = mDegree; lmn[2] = nDegree;
7216 
7217  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Gradient[iDim] = 0.0;
7218 
7219  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7220  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
7221  Gradient[jDim] += GetDerivative2(val_coord, iDim, xyz, lmn) *
7222  GetDerivative3(val_coord, iDim, jDim, lmn);
7223 
7224  return Gradient;
7225 
7226 }
7227 
7228 void CFreeFormDefBox::GetFFDHessian(su2double *uvw, su2double *xyz, su2double **val_Hessian) {
7229 
7230  unsigned short iDim, jDim, lmn[3];
7231 
7232  /*--- Set the Degree of the Berstein polynomials ---*/
7233 
7234  lmn[0] = lDegree; lmn[1] = mDegree; lmn[2] = nDegree;
7235 
7236  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7237  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
7238  val_Hessian[iDim][jDim] = 0.0;
7239 
7240  /*--- Note that being all the functions linear combinations of polynomials, they are C^\infty,
7241  and the Hessian will be symmetric; no need to compute the under-diagonal part, for example ---*/
7242 
7243  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7244  val_Hessian[0][0] += 2.0 * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,0, lmn) * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,0, lmn) +
7245  GetDerivative2(uvw, iDim,xyz, lmn) * GetDerivative5(uvw, iDim,0,0, lmn);
7246 
7247  val_Hessian[1][1] += 2.0 * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,1, lmn) * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,1, lmn) +
7248  GetDerivative2(uvw, iDim,xyz, lmn) * GetDerivative5(uvw, iDim,1,1, lmn);
7249 
7250  val_Hessian[2][2] += 2.0 * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,2, lmn) * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,2, lmn) +
7251  GetDerivative2(uvw, iDim,xyz, lmn) * GetDerivative5(uvw, iDim,2,2, lmn);
7252 
7253  val_Hessian[0][1] += 2.0 * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,0, lmn) * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,1, lmn) +
7254  GetDerivative2(uvw, iDim,xyz, lmn) * GetDerivative5(uvw, iDim,0,1, lmn);
7255 
7256  val_Hessian[0][2] += 2.0 * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,0, lmn) * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,2, lmn) +
7257  GetDerivative2(uvw, iDim,xyz, lmn) * GetDerivative5(uvw, iDim,0,2, lmn);
7258 
7259  val_Hessian[1][2] += 2.0 * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,1, lmn) * GetDerivative3(uvw, iDim,2, lmn) +
7260  GetDerivative2(uvw, iDim,xyz, lmn) * GetDerivative5(uvw, iDim,1,2, lmn);
7261  }
7262 
7263  val_Hessian[1][0] = val_Hessian[0][1];
7264  val_Hessian[2][0] = val_Hessian[0][2];
7265  val_Hessian[2][1] = val_Hessian[1][2];
7266 
7267 }
7268 
7269 su2double *CFreeFormDefBox::GetParametricCoord_Iterative(unsigned long iPoint, su2double *xyz, su2double *ParamCoordGuess, CConfig *config) {
7270 
7271  su2double *IndepTerm, SOR_Factor = 1.0, MinNormError, NormError, Determinant, AdjHessian[3][3], Temp[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0};
7272  unsigned short iDim, jDim, RandonCounter;
7273  unsigned long iter;
7274 
7275  su2double tol = config->GetFFD_Tol();
7276  unsigned short it_max = config->GetnFFD_Iter();
7277  unsigned short Random_Trials = 500;
7278 
7279  /*--- Allocate the Hessian ---*/
7280 
7281  Hessian = new su2double* [nDim];
7282  IndepTerm = new su2double [nDim];
7283  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7284  Hessian[iDim] = new su2double[nDim];
7285  ParamCoord[iDim] = ParamCoordGuess[iDim];
7286  IndepTerm [iDim] = 0.0;
7287  }
7288 
7289  RandonCounter = 0; MinNormError = 1E6;
7290 
7291  /*--- External iteration ---*/
7292 
7293  for (iter = 0; iter < (unsigned long)it_max*Random_Trials; iter++) {
7294 
7295  /*--- The independent term of the solution of our system is -Gradient(sol_old) ---*/
7296 
7297  Gradient = GetFFDGradient(ParamCoord, xyz);
7298 
7299  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) IndepTerm[iDim] = - Gradient[iDim];
7300 
7301  /*--- Hessian = The Matrix of our system, getHessian(sol_old,xyz,...) ---*/
7302 
7303  GetFFDHessian(ParamCoord, xyz, Hessian);
7304 
7305  /*--- Adjoint to Hessian ---*/
7306 
7307  AdjHessian[0][0] = Hessian[1][1]*Hessian[2][2]-Hessian[1][2]*Hessian[2][1];
7308  AdjHessian[0][1] = Hessian[0][2]*Hessian[2][1]-Hessian[0][1]*Hessian[2][2];
7309  AdjHessian[0][2] = Hessian[0][1]*Hessian[1][2]-Hessian[0][2]*Hessian[1][1];
7310  AdjHessian[1][0] = Hessian[1][2]*Hessian[2][0]-Hessian[1][0]*Hessian[2][2];
7311  AdjHessian[1][1] = Hessian[0][0]*Hessian[2][2]-Hessian[0][2]*Hessian[2][0];
7312  AdjHessian[1][2] = Hessian[0][2]*Hessian[1][0]-Hessian[0][0]*Hessian[1][2];
7313  AdjHessian[2][0] = Hessian[1][0]*Hessian[2][1]-Hessian[1][1]*Hessian[2][0];
7314  AdjHessian[2][1] = Hessian[0][1]*Hessian[2][0]-Hessian[0][0]*Hessian[2][1];
7315  AdjHessian[2][2] = Hessian[0][0]*Hessian[1][1]-Hessian[0][1]*Hessian[1][0];
7316 
7317  /*--- Determinant of Hessian ---*/
7318 
7319  Determinant = Hessian[0][0]*AdjHessian[0][0]+Hessian[0][1]*AdjHessian[1][0]+Hessian[0][2]*AdjHessian[2][0];
7320 
7321  /*--- Hessian inverse ---*/
7322 
7323  if (Determinant != 0) {
7324  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7325  Temp[iDim] = 0.0;
7326  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++) {
7327  Temp[iDim] += AdjHessian[iDim][jDim]*IndepTerm[jDim]/Determinant;
7328  }
7329  }
7330  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7331  IndepTerm[iDim] = Temp[iDim];
7332  }
7333  }
7334 
7335  /*--- Update with Successive over-relaxation ---*/
7336 
7337  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7338  ParamCoord[iDim] = (1.0-SOR_Factor)*ParamCoord[iDim] + SOR_Factor*(ParamCoord[iDim] + IndepTerm[iDim]);
7339  }
7340 
7341  /*--- If the gradient is small, we have converged ---*/
7342 
7343  if ((fabs(IndepTerm[0]) < tol) && (fabs(IndepTerm[1]) < tol) && (fabs(IndepTerm[2]) < tol)) break;
7344 
7345  /*--- Compute the norm of the error ---*/
7346 
7347  NormError = 0.0;
7348  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7349  NormError += IndepTerm[iDim]*IndepTerm[iDim];
7350  NormError = sqrt(NormError);
7351 
7352  MinNormError = min(NormError, MinNormError);
7353 
7354  /*--- If we have no convergence with Random_Trials iterations probably we are in a local minima. ---*/
7355 
7356  if (((iter % it_max) == 0) && (iter != 0)) {
7357 
7358  RandonCounter++;
7359  if (RandonCounter == Random_Trials) {
7360  cout << endl << "Unknown point: "<< iPoint <<" (" << xyz[0] <<", "<< xyz[1] <<", "<< xyz[2] <<"). Min Error: "<< MinNormError <<". Iter: "<< iter <<"."<< endl;
7361  }
7362  else {
7363  SOR_Factor = 0.1;
7364  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7365  ParamCoord[iDim] = su2double(rand())/su2double(RAND_MAX);
7366  }
7367 
7368  }
7369 
7370  }
7371 
7372  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7373  delete [] Hessian[iDim];
7374  delete [] Hessian;
7375  delete [] IndepTerm;
7376 
7377  /*--- The code has hit the max number of iterations ---*/
7378 
7379  if (iter == (unsigned long)it_max*Random_Trials) {
7380  cout << "Unknown point: (" << xyz[0] <<", "<< xyz[1] <<", "<< xyz[2] <<"). Increase the value of FFD_ITERATIONS." << endl;
7381  }
7382 
7383  /*--- Real Solution is now ParamCoord; Return it ---*/
7384 
7385  return ParamCoord;
7386 
7387 }
7388 
7389 su2double CFreeFormDefBox::Binomial(unsigned short n, unsigned short m) {
7390 
7391  unsigned short i, j;
7392  su2double result;
7393 
7394  su2double *binomial = new su2double [n+1];
7395 
7396  binomial[0] = 1.0;
7397  for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
7398  binomial[i] = 1.0;
7399  for (j = i-1U; j > 0; --j) {
7400  binomial[j] += binomial[j-1U];
7401  }
7402  }
7403 
7404  result = binomial[m];
7405  if (fabs(result) < EPS*EPS) { result = 0.0; }
7406 
7407  delete [] binomial;
7408 
7409  return result;
7410 
7411 
7412 }
7413 
7414 bool CFreeFormDefBox::GetPointFFD(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned long iPoint) {
7415  su2double Coord[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
7416  unsigned short iVar, jVar, iDim;
7417  bool Inside = false;
7418 
7419  unsigned short Index[5][7] = {
7420  {0, 1, 2, 5, 0, 1, 2},
7421  {0, 2, 7, 5, 0, 2, 7},
7422  {0, 2, 3, 7, 0, 2, 3},
7423  {0, 5, 7, 4, 0, 5, 7},
7424  {2, 7, 5, 6, 2, 7, 5}};
7425  unsigned short nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
7426 
7427  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7428  Coord[iDim] = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim);
7429 
7430  /*--- 1st tetrahedron {V0, V1, V2, V5}
7431  2nd tetrahedron {V0, V2, V7, V5}
7432  3th tetrahedron {V0, V2, V3, V7}
7433  4th tetrahedron {V0, V5, V7, V4}
7434  5th tetrahedron {V2, V7, V5, V6} ---*/
7435 
7436  for (iVar = 0; iVar < 5; iVar++) {
7437  Inside = true;
7438  for (jVar = 0; jVar < 4; jVar++) {
7439  su2double Distance_Point = geometry->Point2Plane_Distance(Coord,
7440  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+1]],
7441  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+2]],
7442  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+3]]);
7443 
7444  su2double Distance_Vertex = geometry->Point2Plane_Distance(Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar]],
7445  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+1]],
7446  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+2]],
7447  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+3]]);
7448  if (Distance_Point*Distance_Vertex < 0.0) Inside = false;
7449  }
7450  if (Inside) break;
7451  }
7452 
7453  return Inside;
7454 
7455 }
7456 
7457 void CFreeFormDefBox::SetDeformationZone(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iFFDBox) {
7458  su2double *Coord;
7459  unsigned short iMarker, iVar, jVar;
7460  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
7461  bool Inside = false;
7462 
7463  unsigned short Index[5][7] = {
7464  {0, 1, 2, 5, 0, 1, 2},
7465  {0, 2, 7, 5, 0, 2, 7},
7466  {0, 2, 3, 7, 0, 2, 3},
7467  {0, 5, 7, 4, 0, 5, 7},
7468  {2, 7, 5, 6, 2, 7, 5}};
7469 
7470  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++)
7471  if (config->GetMarker_All_DV(iMarker) == YES)
7472  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
7473  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
7474  geometry->node[iPoint]->SetMove(false);
7475 
7476  Coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
7477 
7478  /*--- 1st tetrahedron {V0, V1, V2, V5}
7479  2nd tetrahedron {V0, V2, V7, V5}
7480  3th tetrahedron {V0, V2, V3, V7}
7481  4th tetrahedron {V0, V5, V7, V4}
7482  5th tetrahedron {V2, V7, V5, V6} ---*/
7483 
7484  for (iVar = 0; iVar < 5; iVar++) {
7485  Inside = true;
7486  for (jVar = 0; jVar < 4; jVar++) {
7487  su2double Distance_Point = geometry->Point2Plane_Distance(Coord,
7488  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+1]],
7489  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+2]],
7490  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+3]]);
7491  su2double Distance_Vertex = geometry->Point2Plane_Distance(Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar]],
7492  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+1]],
7493  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+2]],
7494  Coord_Corner_Points[Index[iVar][jVar+3]]);
7495  if (Distance_Point*Distance_Vertex < 0.0) Inside = false;
7496  }
7497  if (Inside) break;
7498  }
7499 
7500  if (Inside) {
7501  geometry->node[iPoint]->SetMove(true);
7502  }
7503 
7504  }
7505 }
7506 
7507 su2double CFreeFormDefBox::GetDerivative1(su2double *uvw, unsigned short val_diff, unsigned short *ijk, unsigned short *lmn) {
7508 
7509  unsigned short iDim;
7510  su2double value = 0.0;
7511 
7512  value = GetBernsteinDerivative(lmn[val_diff], ijk[val_diff], uvw[val_diff], 1);
7513  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7514  if (iDim != val_diff)
7515  value *= GetBernstein(lmn[iDim], ijk[iDim], uvw[iDim]);
7516 
7517  return value;
7518 
7519 }
7520 
7521 su2double CFreeFormDefBox::GetDerivative2 (su2double *uvw, unsigned short dim, su2double *xyz, unsigned short *lmn) {
7522 
7523  unsigned short iDegree, jDegree, kDegree;
7524  su2double value = 0.0;
7525 
7526  for (iDegree = 0; iDegree <= lmn[0]; iDegree++)
7527  for (jDegree = 0; jDegree <= lmn[1]; jDegree++)
7528  for (kDegree = 0; kDegree <= lmn[2]; kDegree++) {
7529  value += Coord_Control_Points[iDegree][jDegree][kDegree][dim]
7530  * GetBernstein(lmn[0], iDegree, uvw[0])
7531  * GetBernstein(lmn[1], jDegree, uvw[1])
7532  * GetBernstein(lmn[2], kDegree, uvw[2]);
7533  }
7534 
7535  return 2.0*(value - xyz[dim]);
7536 }
7537 
7538 su2double CFreeFormDefBox::GetDerivative3(su2double *uvw, unsigned short dim, unsigned short diff_this, unsigned short *lmn) {
7539 
7540  unsigned short iDegree, jDegree, kDegree, iDim;
7541  su2double value = 0;
7542 
7543  unsigned short *ijk = new unsigned short[nDim];
7544 
7545  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) ijk[iDim] = 0;
7546 
7547  for (iDegree = 0; iDegree <= lmn[0]; iDegree++)
7548  for (jDegree = 0; jDegree <= lmn[1]; jDegree++)
7549  for (kDegree = 0; kDegree <= lmn[2]; kDegree++) {
7550  ijk[0] = iDegree; ijk[1] = jDegree; ijk[2] = kDegree;
7551  value += Coord_Control_Points[iDegree][jDegree][kDegree][dim] *
7552  GetDerivative1(uvw, diff_this, ijk, lmn);
7553  }
7554 
7555  delete [] ijk;
7556 
7557  return value;
7558 }
7559 
7560 su2double CFreeFormDefBox::GetDerivative4(su2double *uvw, unsigned short val_diff, unsigned short val_diff2,
7561  unsigned short *ijk, unsigned short *lmn) {
7562  unsigned short iDim;
7563  su2double value = 0.0;
7564 
7565  if (val_diff == val_diff2) {
7566  value = GetBernsteinDerivative(lmn[val_diff], ijk[val_diff], uvw[val_diff], 2);
7567  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7568  if (iDim != val_diff)
7569  value *= GetBernstein(lmn[iDim], ijk[iDim], uvw[iDim]);
7570  }
7571  else {
7572  value = GetBernsteinDerivative(lmn[val_diff], ijk[val_diff], uvw[val_diff], 1) *
7573  GetBernsteinDerivative(lmn[val_diff2], ijk[val_diff2], uvw[val_diff2], 1);
7574  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7575  if ((iDim != val_diff) && (iDim != val_diff2))
7576  value *= GetBernstein(lmn[iDim], ijk[iDim], uvw[iDim]);
7577  }
7578 
7579  return value;
7580 }
7581 
7582 su2double CFreeFormDefBox::GetDerivative5(su2double *uvw, unsigned short dim, unsigned short diff_this, unsigned short diff_this_also,
7583  unsigned short *lmn) {
7584 
7585  unsigned short iDegree, jDegree, kDegree, iDim;
7586  su2double value = 0.0;
7587 
7588  unsigned short *ijk = new unsigned short[nDim];
7589 
7590  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) ijk[iDim] = 0;
7591 
7592  for (iDegree = 0; iDegree <= lmn[0]; iDegree++)
7593  for (jDegree = 0; jDegree <= lmn[1]; jDegree++)
7594  for (kDegree = 0; kDegree <= lmn[2]; kDegree++) {
7595  ijk[0] = iDegree; ijk[1] = jDegree; ijk[2] = kDegree;
7596  value += Coord_Control_Points[iDegree][jDegree][kDegree][dim] *
7597  GetDerivative4(uvw, diff_this, diff_this_also, ijk, lmn);
7598  }
7599 
7600  delete [] ijk;
7601 
7602  return value;
7603 }

Definition: option_structure.hpp:1101
CGeometry::SetSpline
void SetSpline(vector< su2double > &x, vector< su2double > &y, unsigned long n, su2double yp1, su2double ypn, vector< su2double > &y2)
Given arrays x[1..n] and y[1..n] containing a tabulated function, i.e., yi = f(xi), with x1 < x2 < . . . < xN , and given values yp1 and ypn for the first derivative of the interpolating function at points 1 and n, respectively, this routine returns an array y2[1..n] that contains the second derivatives of the interpolating function at the tabulated points xi. If yp1 and/or ypn are equal to 1 1030 or larger, the routine is signaled to set the corresponding boundary condition for a natural spline, with zero second derivative on that boundary. Numerical Recipes: The Art of Scientific Computing, Third Edition in C++.

Definition: grid_movement_structure.hpp:1079
CFreeFormDefBox::GetDerivative2
su2double GetDerivative2(su2double *uvw, unsigned short dim, su2double *xyz, unsigned short *lmn)
An auxiliary routine to help us compute the gradient of F(u, v, w) = ||X(u, v, w)-(x, y, z)||^2 = (Sum_ijk^lmn P1_ijk Bi Bj Bk -x)^2+(Sum_ijk^lmn P2_ijk Bi Bj Bk -y)^2+(Sum_ijk^lmn P3_ijk Bi Bj Bk -z)^2 Input: (u, v, w), dim , xyz=(x, y, z), l, m, n E.G.: dim=2 => we use the third coordinate of the control points, and the z-coordinate of xyz (0<=dim<=2) Output: 2* ( (Sum_{i, j, k}^l, m, n P_{ijk}[dim] B_i^l[u] B_j^m[v] B_k^n[w]) - xyz[dim]).
Definition: grid_movement_structure.cpp:7521

Definition: grid_movement_structure.hpp:1084
CFreeFormDefBox::GetDerivative1
su2double GetDerivative1(su2double *uvw, unsigned short val_diff, unsigned short *ijk, unsigned short *lmn)
An auxiliary routine to help us compute the gradient of F(u, v, w) = ||X(u, v, w)-(x, y, z)||^2 = (Sum_ijk^lmn P1_ijk Bi Bj Bk -x)^2+(Sum_ijk^lmn P2_ijk Bi Bj Bk -y)^2+(Sum_ijk^lmn P3_ijk Bi Bj Bk -z)^2 Input: val_t, val_diff (to identify the index of the Bernstein polynomail we differentiate), the i, j, k , l, m, n E.G.: val_diff=2 => we differentiate w.r.t. w (val_diff=0,1, or 2) Output: d [B_i^l*B_j^m *B_k^n] / d val_diff (val_u, val_v, val_w).

CFreeFormDefBox::GetDerivative5
su2double GetDerivative5(su2double *uvw, unsigned short dim, unsigned short diff_this, unsigned short diff_this_also, unsigned short *lmn)
An auxiliary routine to help us compute the Hessian of F(u, v, w) = ||X(u, v, w)-(x, y, z)||^2 = (Sum_ijk^lmn P1_ijk Bi Bj Bk -x)^2+(Sum_ijk^lmn P2_ijk Bi Bj Bk -y)+(Sum_ijk^lmn P3_ijk Bi Bj Bk -z) Input: (u, v, w), dim , diff_this, diff_this_also, xyz=(x, y, z), l, m, n Output: Sum_{i, j, k}^{l, m, n} [two of them with -1, depending on diff_this, diff_this_also=0,1 or 2] P_{ijk}[dim] * (B_i^l[u] B_j^m[v] B_k^n[w])one of them diffrentiated; which? diff_thiss will tell us ; E.G.: dim=2, diff_this=1 => we use the third coordinate of the control points, and derivate de v-Bersntein polynomial (use m-1 when summing!!).

CFreeFormDefBox::GetDerivative4
su2double GetDerivative4(su2double *uvw, unsigned short val_diff, unsigned short val_diff2, unsigned short *ijk, unsigned short *lmn)
An auxiliary routine to help us compute the Hessian of F(u, v, w) = ||X(u, v, w)-(x, y, z)||^2 = (Sum_ijk^lmn P1_ijk Bi Bj Bk -x)^2+(Sum_ijk^lmn P2_ijk Bi Bj Bk -y)+(Sum_ijk^lmn P3_ijk Bi Bj Bk -z) Input: val_t, val_diff, val_diff2 (to identify the index of the Bernstein polynomials we differentiate), the i, j, k , l, m, n E.G.: val_diff=1, val_diff2=2 => we differentiate w.r.t. v and w (val_diff=0,1, or 2) E.G.: val_diff=0, val_diff2=0 => we differentiate w.r.t. u two times Output: [d [B_i^l*B_j^m *B_k^n]/d val_diff *d [B_i^l*B_j^m *B_k^n]/d val_diff2] (val_u, val_v, val_w) .
